import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { DinamicInput } from 'src/app/utils/DinamicInput'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nuevo-cliente', templateUrl: './nuevo-cliente.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nuevo-cliente.component.css'] }) export class NuevoClienteComponent extends DinamicInput{ formNewClient!: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { super(); } ngOnInit() { this.formNewClient = this.fb.group({ documentNumber: new FormControl(''), namesClient: new FormControl(''), lastnamesClient: new FormControl(''), state: new FormControl(''), city: new FormControl(''), street: new FormControl(''), phoneNumber: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl(''), }) } }
